titleStmt.title: A wonderfull prophecye contynuyng tyll the yere of our Lorde, M.D.LX made by the famous and excellente clerke, Master Iohn Caryon, astronomer of the prince electour of Brandenborgh, for a glasse or example to them that understand and are wyse, and for a disdayne and reprofe to them that are folysh ; translated out of Doutch into J[n]glysh by Anthony Scoloker.
titleStmt.author: Carion, Johannes, 1499-1537 or 8.
Scoloker, Anthony, fl. 1548.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Anthony Scoloker and Wyllyam Seres, Dwelling in the Sauoyrẽtes Wythout Templebarre,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: fragment, all after p. [12] lacking; remainder cropped, stained, torn, and tightly bound. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: John Rylands University Library of Manchester.
